diff_hunk:
@@ -26,10 +26,18 @@ TensorImpl::TensorImpl(TensorTypeId type_id, ScalarType scalar_type, Allocator *
   }
 }
 
-TensorImpl::TensorImpl(Storage&& storage, TensorTypeId type_id, bool is_variable)
-    : TensorImpl(std::move(storage), type_id, dataTypeToScalarType(storage.dtype()), is_variable) {}
-
-TensorImpl::TensorImpl(Storage&& storage, TensorTypeId type_id, ScalarType scalar_type, bool is_variable)
+TensorImpl::TensorImpl(Storage storage, TensorTypeId type_id, bool is_variable)
+    :storage_(std::move(storage)),
+    storage_offset_(0),
+    sizes_{0},
+    strides_{1},
+    is_contiguous_(true),
+    numel_(0),
+    type_id_(type_id),
+    scalar_type_(dataTypeToScalarType(storage_.dtype())),
+    is_variable_(is_variable) {}
body: This is needed because you shouldn't call std::move() in one argument and use the moved thing in another argument, which was how the old code did it.
body_html: This is needed because you shouldn't call std::move() in one argument and use the moved thing in another argument, which was how the old code did it.
body_text: This is needed because you shouldn't call std::move() in one argument and use the moved thing in another argument, which was how the old code did it.
